source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
essment. The woman can be discharged home (or to a maternity waiting home) if:
o The maternal and fetal condition are both reassuring
o There is no increase in contractions / irregular contractions or contractions have ceased completely
o No ruptured membranes (ROM)
o No cervical changes since admission and no further descent of the presenting part
o Warning signs have been explained: increased pain, ROM, vaginal bleeding, reduced fetal movement â€“
counsel the mother and verify she has understood
